name: Super Chicken Delux Edition 3.14
description:
Instructions: Fly using W,A,S,D. Click on the Bombs to detonante them

--------------------------

What does a chicken do when its baby is kidnapped?! It flies to save the baby!

Super Chicken Delux Edition 3.14 is an infinite flying-simulator that challenges your multi-tasking abilities! Dodge the obstacles, fly through the booster rings and destroy the bombs in your path to save the baby chicken.

This project was done as part of the  "Game Engine (Moteur de jeu)" lesson in University of Strasbourg. The group consisted of Iman Irajdoost and Ahmad Jreda.
